message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm counteroffering at $110.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still need to make a good profit. I'm going to counter at $115.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $105 for the product.
I'm not budging much more, Bob. I'll meet you at $110, but that's my final offer.
